title: Ticket #4113: Add GLOBUS_GATEKEEPER_TIMEOUT -alike to EC2.
description:
This feature request was prompted by a failure mode of the EC2 tests after implementing #4004, where an EC2 simulator failure delayed the test suite by an hour. Although we've since added a shorter time-out for this test, this incident still pointed out the need for a lease on down resources (to prevent us from retrying indefinitely). Putting the job on hold after this lease expires will cause the test to fail (almost) immediately thereafter.

After implementing this feature, the test suite will need to be modified to set the configuration variable EC2_RESOURCE_TIMEOUT to a very small value.
